short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all tabs not matching a provided regex at a scheduled frequency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At the specified interval, kill any tabs that don't match the provided "spare me" list.

The purpose is to prevent the explosive growth of tabs in your browser.
